Good Comments: Highest resolution, even though it's an AVI. Styled subtitles are easier to read than other groups plain SRTs in soeme scenes.

Very nice, only saw one grammatical error that most people will not even notice at all.

The quality is great and the font style fit the story perfectly. I strongly suggest this group for Pale Cocoon.
Bad Comments: Probably decent subs, but Xvid is shit.
